com.ibm.ccl.soa.deploy.core.validator.pattern.link
Class MultiplicityChecker

java.lang.Object
  com.ibm.ccl.soa.deploy.core.validator.pattern.link.MultiplicityChecker

public class MultiplicityChecker
extends java.lang.Object

Check for valid multiplicity

TODO If there is a Java-originated membership constraint as well as a Requirement.MEMBER on the Unit, which takes precedence?

NOTE: A Unit can be a link source if it has a Requirement with linktype MEMBER and that Requirement has either at least one OutCardinality or it has no InCardinality.
